mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Jethrow Phillips
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Jethrow Phillips Tobias D. Phillips, Guardian until his death soon after 12.31.1885 Recorded in Ledger Book 3, page 32, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
